title.@value: Oppositional defiant disorder with chronic irritability-anger with typical prosocial emotions

definition.@value: All definitional requirements for oppositional defiant disorder with chronic irritability-anger are met. The individual does not exhibit characteristics referred to as ‘callous and unemotional’, such as lack of empathy or sensitivity to the feelings of others and a lack of concern for others’ distress.

label.@value: Oppositional defiant disorder with chronic irritability-anger with typical prosocial emotions
